
(a / and
      :op1 (p / possible :polarity -
            :domain (m / move-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :time (a2 / after
                        :op1 (t3 / that))))
      :op2 (s / sleep-01
            :ARG0 t
            :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 6
                  :unit (m2 / month)
                  :ARG1-of (n / need-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :purpose (d / digest-01
                              :ARG0 t)))))
